titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain table tennis tables.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: House Committee on Ways and Means Granted Extention for Further Consideration Ending not Later Than July 25, 2003..

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2006, the duty on certain table tennis tables.
